# React Vite Project - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
This is a React application created with Vite, a fast build tool that provides a modern development experience.

## Project Type
- **Framework**: React
- **Build Tool**: Vite
- **Language**: JavaScript/TypeScript

## Development Guidelines
- Use modern React hooks and functional components
- Follow React best practices
- Utilize Vite's fast HMR (Hot Module Replacement)
